ingredients.ingredient: 4 large whole artichokes, top 1 inch and stems removed
4 cloves garlic, cloves peeled and crushed

cookingTips: Cut artichokes in half lengthwise and scoop out the fuzzy choke center before roasting
Toss artichokes with lemon oil mixture and place cut-side down for browning
Cover with foil if browning too quickly, and roast until leaves pull off easily
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Artichokes have a unique anatomy—how does cutting and removing the choke center affect both cooking time and the eating experience?
